.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-const:

==============================
const ViewHelper `<vhs:const>`
==============================


Const ViewHelper
================

Renders the value of a PHP constant


.. _fluidtypo3-vhs-const_arguments:

Arguments
=========


.. _const_name:

name
----

:aspect:`DataType`
   string

:aspect:`Required`
   false
:aspect:`Description`
   Name of constant to retrieve
